# Project plan

## Start-up phase

October 2020 - December 2020: 

* Invite new team members. 
* Team orientation for all members.
* First series of webinars that use funding.
* Recording of first set of Why R? World Videos.

January 2021 - June 2021 

* Regular meetings with R consortium representatives to monitor progress and discuss list of invited speakers.
* Production of the Remaining programme of webinars that use funding.
* Recording and release of remaining series of Why R? World Videos.
